mapper.sql: CODE_TYPE, CODE_VALUE, CODE_NAME, CODE_DESC, CODE_ORDER, SUP_CODE_VALUE, CREATE_DATE, DATA_STATE
mapper.insert: insert into code_value (CODE_TYPE, CODE_VALUE, CODE_NAME, CODE_DESC, CODE_ORDER, SUP_CODE_VALUE, CREATE_DATE, DATA_STATE) values (#{codeType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{codeValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeOrder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{supCodeValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dataState,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into code_value
CODE_TYPE,
CODE_VALUE,
CODE_NAME,
CODE_DESC,
CODE_ORDER,

CREATE_DATE,
DATA_STATE,

mapper.update:
update code_value
CODE_NAME = #{codeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE_DESC = #{codeDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE_ORDER = #{codeOrder,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SUP_CODE_VALUE = #{supCodeValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DATA_STATE = #{dataState,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where CODE_TYPE = #{codeType,jdbcType=INTEGER} and CODE_VALUE = #{codeValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT from code_value where CODE_TYPE=#{codeType} ORDER BY CODE_ORDER
